
# Northy
## tweets
> This collection contains tweets collected through active monitoring

Schema

* `tid` string : Twitter ID
* `text` string : Multi-line raw Twitter text
* `username` string : Username of the Twitter Account
* `created_at` datetime : Tweet creation timestamp
* `alert` bool : Indicate if tweet is an alert (trading signal) or not
* `action` array : Each element contains the trade signals that are _dynamically_ generated by the parser
* `action_manual` array : Each element contains the trade signals that are manually verified. This is used when backtesting against the dynamically generated values in `action`


<details>
<summary>Sample Document</summary>

```json
{
    "_id": {
        "$oid": "63435e1ae208d6b07d38f4dc"
    },
    "tid": "1557706178116853760",
    "username": "NTLiveStream",
    "alert": true,
    "created_at": {
        "$date": {
        "$numberLong": "1660221068000"
        }
    },
    "text": "ALERT: flat stopped $NDX stopped $SPX\nRe-entry short\nIN 13475- 25 pt stop\nIN 4241 - 10 pt stop",
    "action": [
        "NDX_TRADE_SHORT_IN_13475_SL_25",
        "SPX_TRADE_SHORT_IN_4241_SL_10"
    ]
}
```
</details>
